References
* Panagiotis Filos (2018) [https://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2018/2018.03.46/ The Brill Dictionary of Ancient Greek] (review) in Bryn Mawr Classical Review
* Pauline Hire [https://www.jstor.org/stable/4352927?seq=7 The Cambridge New Greek Lexicon Project] in The Classical World Vol. 98, No. 2 (Winter, 2005), pp. 179-185
* [https://www.classics.cam.ac.uk/research/projects/glp Cambridge Greek Lexicon] (2021), official project webpage
* [https://williamaross.com/2019/10/28/the-cambridge-greek-lexicon-an-interview-with-prof-james-diggle/ The Cambridge Greek Lexicon: An Interview with Prof. James Diggle], Oct 28, 2019
* Franco Montanari, Αντώνιος Ρεγκάκος, [https://www.papadimasbooks.gr/product.asp?catid=2177 Σύγχρονο λεξικό της αρχαίας ελληνικής γλώσσας ], publisher's site
* Franco Montanari, Michael Meier-Brügger, Paul Dräger, [https://www.degruyter.com/document/isbn/9783110183924/html GD – Wörterbuch Altgriechisch–Deutsch], publisher's site
* H. Liddell, R. Scott, Q. Cataudella, M. Manfredi, F. Di Benedetto, [https://books.google.com/books?id=3MRnNQAACAAJ Dizionario illustrato greco-italiano], Google Books
